titles.title: Providing for the concurrence of the House with the amendment of the Senate to H.R. 914, with amendments.

action.text: Mr. McKeon moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/13/1997--Introduced. Provides for taking from the Speaker's table H.R. 914 (graduation data disclosure under the Higher Education Act of 1965) and agreeing to Senate amendments with amendments.
